title: FS Raw T206 Cards new prices on remaining
author: rootsearcher60

posts.post_title: FS Raw T206 Cards new prices on remaining
posts.post_content:
Raw T206 for sale- Shipping $3 (will combine shipping). PPFF. I'll take it or SOLD trumps negotiations. Thank you. Michael  (fiveelgins@gmail.com)
A couple of cards I describe as miscut may have been trimmed. I purchased the Herzog and Konetchy as part of a lot from Heritage and they did not describe them as altered. Please use your best judgement. 

Carrigan   PD350/25  wrinkles left of face, crease bottom left corner   $30SOLD
Clark  PD350/25  wrinkles and creases, pin hole               $20
Congalton  SC350/30   rounded corners               $30SOLD
DavisPD350-460/25 miscut, wrinkles, sticker on reverse       $20SOLD
DessauPD350/25  soiked, crease upper right, scratch down ctr       $25SOLD
FreemanPD350/25 rounded corners, scuffed               $30SOLD
GeyerPD350-460/25 scuffed, crease thru face       $20SOLD
HartselSC350/30 miscut, tobacco stained               $20
HemphillPD150/25 creases                       $20SOLD
HerzogPD350-460/25 slightly miscut but nice               $40SOLD
KonetchySC350/30 miscut nice image                       $30SOLD
LeachPolar Bear stains                       $45SOLD
MoranPD350/25 missing paper reverse, nice front                       $40SOLD
NicholsSC350/30  wet-sheet transfer?               $50SOLD
PeltyPolar Bear  crease upper right, crease center to bottom       $30SOLD
SnodgrassPD350/25 missing piece lower right corner                       $30SOLD
StephensPD350/25  stained, missing piece front       $20SOLD

I'll take the Leach polar bear back.

Thx
I’ll take Nichols and would like to reserve Herzog pending a better scan - just want to be comfortable with what I see on that one.  Email -  [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]

I will take Hemphill and Stephens, if available.
Thanks
I will take Davis & Geyer please. Thank you Joe
